main-item.title: APPETIZER
main-item.description: THE FIRST COURSE OF A MEAL

appertizer-menu.title: Shrimp Cocktail
appertizer-menu.description: Seafood dish consisting of shelled, cooked prawns in a Marie Rose sauce,served in a glass.

appertizer-menu.title: Black Caviar
appertizer-menu.description: With cream cheese and dill. Also deliver a sweet, buttery flavor.

appertizer-menu.title: Tortilla
appertizer-menu.description: Italian twist with a creamy sundried tomato, pesto, and Parmesan filling.

appertizer-menu.title: Raw Zucchini Wraps
appertizer-menu.description: With turkey, cheese, and pesto all wrapped up in cucumber slices.

appertizer-menu.title: Deviled Eggs
appertizer-menu.description: Filled with a creamy filling made by combining the cooked yolks with mayonnaise, mustard.

appertizer-menu.title: Smoked Salmon
appertizer-menu.description: The classic combination of smoked salmon, dill, cucumber and cream cheese.

appertizer-menu.title: French Fries
appertizer-menu.description: Fries are often salted and served with ketchup, mayonnaise.

appertizer-menu.title: Fortune Cookies
appertizer-menu.description: A crisp and sugary cookie wafer made from flour, sugar, vanilla, and sesame seed oil with a piece of paper inside.
